title: Daily Review with Clay and Buck - Jun 7 2022

description:
Has Climate Change Activism Jumped the Fourteen-Wheeler? Midterm Forecast: GOP's Best Position in 80 Years? Ann Coulter Fillets the Gun Debate Spin Zone. Matthew McConaughey Tells Us What We Need -- and You Better Wear the Ribbon!
